member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.FacebookAppBuilderExtensions
member.summary: Extension methods to add Facebook authentication capabilities to an HTTP application pipeline.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.FacebookAppBuilderExtensions.UseFacebookAuthentication(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.IApplicationBuilder)
member.summary: UseFacebookAuthentication is obsolete. Configure Facebook authentication with AddAuthentication().AddFacebook in ConfigureServices. See https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=845470 for more details.
member.param: The to add the handler to.
member.returns: A reference to this instance after the operation has completed.

member.summary: Check that the options are valid. Should throw an exception if things are not ok.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Facebook.FacebookOptions.AppId
member.summary: Gets or sets the Facebook-assigned appId.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Facebook.FacebookOptions.AppSecret

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Facebook.FacebookOptions.SendAppSecretProof
member.summary: Gets or sets if the appsecret_proof should be generated and sent with Facebook API calls. This is enabled by default.
